results.description: The club wants to mark the 150th anniversary of its staging of the first ever Sevens tournament.
results.title: Melrose harbour Rugby World Cup Sevens hopes

results.description: England's men and women's teams reach the quarter-finals of the Olympic Rugby Sevens tournaments, with the winners earning qualification for Tokyo 2020.
results.shortTitle: England men & women into Sevens quarters
results.title: Olympic rugby sevens qualifying: England men & women into quarter-finals

results.description: England finish third at the Moscow Sevens in the first round of the Rugby Europe Grand Prix Series.
results.shortTitle: England finish third at Moscow Sevens
results.title: Moscow Sevens: England finish third after beating Germany

results.description: Fiji seal their fourth World Rugby Sevens Series title as they win the season-ending Paris Sevens tournament in style.
results.shortTitle: Fiji win fourth World Rugby Sevens title
results.title: World Rugby Sevens Series: Fiji win in Paris and claim fourth series title

results.description: Fiji climb to the top of the standings in the World Rugby Sevens Series after winning the London Sevens for the second year running.
results.title: World Rugby Sevens Series: Fiji win London Sevens to go top of standings

results.description: England narrowly miss out on reaching the Cup quarter-finals as they host the latest World Rugby Sevens Series event in London.
results.title: World Rugby Sevens: England miss out on Cup quarter-finals in London

results.description: Wales' future in the top flight of sevens is on the line ahead of the penultimate weekend of the World Rugby Sevens Series.
results.title: World Rugby Sevens Series: Wales in 'fight for survival'

results.description: England, Ireland, USA and France sign up for the inaugural Rugby X five-a-side tournament in October.
results.shortTitle: England and Ireland sign up for Rugby X
results.title: Rugby X: England and Ireland among nations to sign up for event

results.description: Sam Oliver sued a TV network after being cleared of assaulting Australia's ex-Rugby Sevens captain.
results.shortTitle: UK tourist wins Australia defamation case
results.title: UK tourist Sam Oliver wins Australian defamation case

thumbnail.altText: Sam Oliver outside court in Sydney

results.description: England Women concede a try after the full-time hooter sounds as they lose 7-5 to Canada in the World Rugby Sevens Cup final in Japan.
results.shortTitle: England Women lose dramatic Sevens final
results.title: World Rugby Sevens: England women lose to Canada in final

results.description: England's men register a straightforward 28-7 victory over the USA to secure bronze at the Singapore Sevens on Sunday.
results.title: Singapore Sevens: England beat USA 28-7 to win bronze medal

results.description: England men win bronze at the Sydney Sevens with a 19-17 defeat of Rio 2016 Olympic champions Fiji.
results.shortTitle: England men win Sydney Sevens bronze
results.title: Sydney Sevens: England men win bronze with narrow win over Fiji

thumbnail.altText: Dan Norton and Dan Bibby shake hands

results.description: Scotland lose 19-14 to eventual finalists USA after reaching the quarter-finals of the Hamilton leg of the World Rugby Sevens series.
results.title: World Rugby Sevens: Scotland lose to finalists USA in quarter-final

results.description: England and Wales are knocked out of the latest leg of the World Rugby Sevens series in Hamilton, New Zealand.
results.shortTitle: England and Wales out of World Sevens
results.title: World Rugby Sevens: England and Wales knocked out in Hamilton

results.description: England World Cup winners Katy Daley-Mclean, Sarah Hunter, Marlie Packer and Vicky Fleetwood are among the 28 players to be awarded full-time contracts by the Rugby Football Union.
results.title: England Women announce 28 players on full-time contracts

results.description: After a challenging start to the sevens series in Dubai, Wales bounce back with victories over Zimbabwe and Japan.
results.shortTitle: Wales finish Dubai sevens series on high
results.title: World Rugby Sevens Series: Wales beat Zimbabwe and Japan

thumbnail.altText: Paul Bonnefond of France and Will Talbot-Davies of Wales

results.description: Wales' inexperienced sevens side will come back stronger after a winless first day in Dubai, says head coach Richie Pugh.
results.shortTitle: Wales have 'tough' first day at Dubai sevens
results.title: World Rugby Sevens Series: Wales lose to NZ, USA and Spain

thumbnail.altText: Wales v Canada Dubai Rugby Sevens

results.description: Some Wales players will be "thrown into the deep end" against champions New Zealand in the World Rugby Sevens Series.
results.shortTitle: Wales open sevens series against NZ
results.title: World Rugby Sevens Series: Wales face champions New Zealand

results.description: After England footballer Karen Carney receives rape and death threats, sports stars open up about social media abuse.
results.shortTitle: 'It's hurtful and scary - I avoid reading it'
results.title: Karen Carney: Sports stars react to social media abuse

results.description: The Rugby Football Union is to integrate its men's and women's sevens programmes in order to create a "strong culture and identity".
results.title: England Rugby Sevens: RFU to integrate men's and women's programmes
